text: Really hoping the US overproduces so many vaccines Mexico will get them for cheap.

elements.text: Really hoping the US overproduces so many vaccines Mexico will get them for cheap.

text:
We’re toast here as well, if we allow COVID to keep circulating around the world and having more chances to mutate.
I hope the US produces so many vaccines that countries around the world will get them for cheap, but not by accident, on purpose

elements.text:
We’re toast here as well, if we allow COVID to keep circulating around the world and having more chances to mutate.

text:
> I hope the US produces so many vaccines that countries around the world will get them for cheap, but not by accident, on purpose
So far they're doing the opposite, given that they're holding back doses of a vaccine that isn't even allowed to be used in the US yet: <https://www.nytimes.com/2021/03/11/us/politics/coronavirus-astrazeneca-united-states.html>
